General.Name: Hangzhou Raycloud Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Raycloud Technology Co., Ltd. operates as an e-commerce software and service technology company in China and internationally. It offers various products and services that help e-commerce merchants to do business. The company provides e-commerce SaaS products and supporting hardware, as well as CRM SMS and operation services. Its e-commerce SaaS products include super store manager, super express, and other software. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
